name: Gobang～beginner～
description:
■ It is an application for beginners for people who want to start the game.
・Gobang is a classic board game that has been played well since long ago, using boards and stones of go.
・For those who want to learn Gobang from zero, even beginners have made rules easy to understand.
・You can play against your friends by using one terminal.
・When you want to return to the previous hand, you can return using the wait.
・When you do not know where to put the stone stone, you can show the place where you should put the stone by using the hint.
・You can look back at the results of the match at any time on the game screen.
・This application is an introductory version of Gobang.
・Repeat competition against AI and let 's strengthen Gobang.
・This application can learn rules of the Gobang free of charge.
・There are no rules to be forbidden.

■ Rule explanation
・Place white and black go stones alternately on the board and the one who lined up straight lines will win.
・Prohibited hand setting can not be done with this application.
・The rule of the Renju is not carried.

■Recommended for people like this
・Those who want to play the game in vacant time.
・Person who wants to start Gobang.
・A person who wants to AI of a weak Gobang.
・People who want to become stronger in the Gobang.
・People who want to start the Gobang.
・People who want to learn rules.

■ Supported languages
Japanese・English・Chinese・Korean・Russian
